import React from 'react' import { useSelector} from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Avatar from '../util/Avatar' import styles from './RsMenu.module.css' const RsMenu = () => { const {auth} = useSelector(state=>state) const list = [ {label: 'Home', path: '/'}, {label: 'Inbox', path: '/'}, {label: 'Code', path: '/'}, {label: 'Saved', path: '/'}, {label: 'Change password', path: '/'}, {label: 'Logout', path: '/'}, ] return (
  • {auth.user.username}
    • {list.map(e=>(
  • {e.label}
    • ))}
) } export default RsMenu
